title: Location and Time
description:
We meet at Ruggles Baptist Church on the second floor. 874 Beacon Street, Boston, MA 02215.

The Church is located on the corner of Beacon Street and Park Drive, 2 blocks west of Kenmore Square.

commute.name: Access by T:
commute.description: Take the bus to Kenmore Square, or bus #47 which stops in front of the church, or The Green line:

directions.station: line to St Mary's Street (closest to the church)
